articles.title: Lebensstandard für fast 50 Prozent der EU-Bürger gesunken
articles.image_title: MADRID, SPAIN - DECEMBER 31: Volunteers from the NGO Mensajeros de la Paz prepare bags of food to deliver to people in need at Padre Angel's San Anton church on December 31, 2022, in Madrid, Spain. For the third consecutive year, the food company Shukran Foods and Mensajeros de la Paz have joined forces to offer a special dinner to 150 people in vulnerable situations so that they can enjoy a delicious meal on New Year's Eve. For several years, Shukran has been collaborating with Father Angel's organization to accompany the most needy on days as important as this one. (Photo By Carlos Lujan/Europa Press via Getty Images) Getty ImagesGetty Images
articles.author: 40 Sek

articles.title: Riesiges Vorkommen an seltenen Erden in Schweden entdeckt
articles.image_title: (FILES) This file photo taken on November 16, 2012 shows the iron mine of Swedish state-owned mining company LKAB (Luossavaara-Kiirunavaara Aktiebolag) at Sweden's northernmost town of Kiruna. - Europe's largest known deposit of rare earth elements -- key for the production of electric cars -- has been discovered in Sweden's far north, Swedish mining company LKAB said on January 12, 2023. LKAB said the newly-explored deposit, found right next to an iron ore mine, contained more than one million tonnes of rare earth oxides. (Photo by Jonathan NACKSTRAND / AFP)
